alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Mahnomen (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:55PM CDT until August 08 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MAHNOMEN AND SOUTHWESTERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Island Lake in Mahnomen County, or 39 miles west of Bemidji, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Rice Lake, Roy Lake, Beaulieu, Pine Bend, Ebro and Mahkonce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
